title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta/bacon with garlic until crispy, then remove garlic.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with bacon, then remove from heat.
Mix in egg and cheese mixture (off the heat) to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until partially cooked, set aside.

Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add chicken pieces and cook until fully done.
Stir in cream, season with salt, and simmer until thickened.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, lemon juice, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top for extra flavor.
